name: Alberta Survey, 1997

creator.name: Population Research Laboratory
creator.affiliation: Department of Sociology, University of Alberta

author.name: Population Research Laboratory
author.affiliation: Department of Sociology, University of Alberta

description: The 1997 Alberta Survey (AS) was the tenth annual provincial survey administered by the Population Research Laboratory (PRL). This omnibus style survey of households in the province of Alberta has enabled academic researchers, government departments, non profit organizations, and the pri vate sector to explore a wide range of research topics in a structured research framework.
keywords: crime and the criminal justice system
employment-related assistance for physically limited individuals
social assistance and student finance board benefits
